name: Baccarat - Repeater - Churchill
additionalNotes: Crafted from a delicious blend of Honduran long-leaf fillers, a Mexican binder and a gorgeous Honduran wrapper, the Repeater is flawlessly constructed. Dominated by a mellow tobacco flavor, the taste profile is complementedÂ by the signature sweet gum cap, which is a staple on most Baccarat cigars. A smooth draw and burn, coupled with the delicious flavors, make this Honduran beauty an extremely pleasurable smoking experience whether you light up in morning or at night.
